```css
// Property: keyboardToolbarHeight
// Description: Height of the keyboard toolbar if keyboardToolbar is an array.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.TextArea, Ti.UI.TextField
'.keyboard-toolbar-h-0': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 0 }
'.keyboard-toolbar-h-1': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 4 }
'.keyboard-toolbar-h-2': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 8 }

'.keyboard-toolbar-h-16': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 64 }
'.keyboard-toolbar-h-20': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 80 }

'.keyboard-toolbar-h-28': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 112 }
'.keyboard-toolbar-h-32': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 128 }
'.keyboard-toolbar-h-36': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 144 }
'.keyboard-toolbar-h-40': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 160 }

'.keyboard-toolbar-h-72': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 288 }
'.keyboard-toolbar-h-80': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 320 }
'.keyboard-toolbar-h-96': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 384 }
'.keyboard-toolbar-h-px': { keyboardToolbarHeight: '1px' }
'.keyboard-toolbar-h-0.5': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 2 }
'.keyboard-toolbar-h-1.5': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 6 }
'.keyboard-toolbar-h-2.5': { keyboardToolbarHeight: 10 }
```
